revised_title: New Reptile Discoveries in the Elgin Sandstone
tldr: The authors describe new reptile fossils found in the Elgin Sandstone, including eight distinct skeletons belonging to the Dicynodontia group and a unique horned reptile. They discuss the process of preserving and casting the fossil molds, as well as the characteristics and distinctions of the various species discovered. These findings contribute to the understanding of ancient reptile life and the geological history of the Elgin Sandstone.
